title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4056.2 - Stable names must be registered
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4056.2 - Stable names must be registered

State Regulations
A horse cannot be entered in the real or the stable
name of any person as the horse's owner unless that person's interest or
property in the horse is at least equal to that of any one person and has been
so registered with the National Steeplechase and Hunt

Association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4056.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
